channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Premiere Elements
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Premiere Elements

item.title: CVE-2022-34235|2024-09-17T01:56:21.281Z -- adobe -- premiere%20elements
item.description: Adobe Premiere Elements version 2020v20 (and earlier) is affected by an Uncontrolled Search Path Element which could lead to Privilege Escalation. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to obtain admin using an existing low-privileged user. Exploitation of this issue does not require user interaction.
